channel.title: Ringtone Help Needed
channel.description:
I'm helping a friend get free ringtones because we can't find any ICP ringtones online. Anyways, I downloaded software that will convert sections of an mp3 to a .amr, and then another program that will upload the file to a mobile friendly website so that my friend can download it to his phone, and set it as his ringtone. We downloaded it fine but we couldn't set it as a ringtone. The phone says it is not allowed. After research we found that his model phone, the SGH-D807, can only have .DS, and .DM ringtones. We searched google, and cnet for a converter but we can't find anything having to do with a file exetension .dm, let alone a converter. If anyone has had this problem before, and can help us, it would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Buzzy

item.title: Ringtone Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I’m helping a friend get free ringtones because we can’t find any ICP ringtones online. Anyways, I downloaded software that will convert sections of an mp3 to a .amr, and then another program that will upload the file to a mobile friendly website so that my friend can download it to his phone, and set it as his ringtone. We downloaded it fine but we couldn’t set it as a ringtone. The phone says it is not allowed. After research we found that his model phone, the SGH-D807, can only have .DS, and .DM ringtones. We searched google, and cnet for a converter but we can’t find anything having to do with a file exetension .dm, let alone a converter. If anyone has had this problem before, and can help us, it would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Buzzy
